resources.string: Play sound when adjusting volume with hard keys
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Enables high-end visual effects such as transparent status/navigation bar (requires reboot)
Shows the content behind your lockscreen, your data may be visible to those around you
"Changing permissions of core Android components might lead to undesired behavior. Change settings here at your own risk!
Display a notification when USB debugging is connected
Change the order of PIN pad numbers
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting the charger
Pressing the menu button unlocks the device
Show the pointer icon while using stylus
Launch custom actions with stylus button swipe gestures. Warning: apps will not be able to receive input fired by holding the stylus button
Launch custom action on left swipe
Launch custom action on right swipe
Launch custom action on up swipe
Launch custom action on down swipe
Launch custom action on long press
Launch custom action on double tap
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Press on color below to apply
Hide when there is no traffic
Hide network speed indicator when there is no traffic
Use MIUI style NetStats instead of classic Traffic meter
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Change the color of network speed indicator
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Configure the hours the device should be quiet
Incoming calls will behave like usual during quiet hours
When to start enforcing quiet hours
When to stop enforcing quiet hours
Notification light will function as normal
Haptic feedback will function as normal
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies for task switching and moving gestures
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Halo will disappear completely when empty
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app
Enable \'wipe data\' and \'force close\' options in notification area and recent apps list
Drag the slider to targets to assign shortcuts
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Lock screen shortcuts reset to default
Delete all user created lock screen shortcuts and restore to default?
Select or change the desired application or activity and the associated icon

ART is not supported by DU. This setting is included for experimentation only and has the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss, a nuclear holocaust and your cat may catch on fire. Visit Introducing ART for more information.

We request you do not file bug reports if you have enabled ART as your runtime.

Are you sure you want to reboot to change runtime from %1$s to %2$s?
Notice:\nAs the start volume is set higher than the ringer volume, the ring tone will be played using the ringer volume.
Let others know about Dirty Unicorns

These settings are included for experimentation and any changes made to them have the potential to cause instability, crashes, data loss or hardware failures.\n\nWe request you do not file bug reports if any of these settings have been changed from the defaults.
The time between wifi scans when no stored access points are available
Windows Manager\'s max events per second
This is a runtime value that controls the number of events the system will allow in a second
The amount of time from when the system registers an incoming phone call until the ringer
This controls the size of the cache the Dalvik VM has access to
This controls the density of the LCD (dpi)
We should look because knowing is half the battle
*WARNING* if you change this value it will add the needed values to your build.prop if they are not already present
When you are in-call screen is off when the device moves away from your face this delay value controls how long before screen turns on
This is astetic and doesn\'t improve the system
Modify the buffer-size for better performance
Enable hardware acceleration where the GPU controls the UI instead of the CPU
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Blame Kenneth!
See through lockscreen with blur effect
Set the blur radius for the blur effect
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
Display the name of the currently connected Wifi network
Press on color below to apply
View, select or change the displayed tiles
Reset displayed tiles and layout to default?
All tiles were removed. Quick settings are disabled.\n\nTo enable add a tile.

To add a quick settings tile, press the Add button and choose the tile you would like. To rearrange your tiles, longpress the tile and drag it into the position you want. If you want to delete a tile, drag it to the delete button which appears while dragging the tile.

To setup dynamic tiles press the respective icon on the top right of the screen

To disable quick settings, remove all tiles.
View or change quick settings style options
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity
Check to see what has changed in DU
Help make DU better by opting into anonymous stats reporting
Use the same tiles and layout as the Quick Settings panel
Toggle on/off camera widget on the lock screen
Add, remove, and position items in the @ppbar
Position the Appbar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the \@appbar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Info about the devs, maintainers, contributors and rom features
Use identicon as default contact picture when creating new contacts
Choose an identicon style to use
Create identicons for existing contacts without a contact photo
Remove identicon from contacts that have one set
Must draw gesture to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock gesture
Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide low priority notifications such as google now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Add possibility to toggle between normal and expanded view by longpress. The expanded view sometimes shows more private information so you might want to disable it.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from beeing shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Sets the width of notifications dynamic, so that they only use the space they really need
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Lock color will be set to your custom image
Color of the widget and unlock frames
Show slider lockscreen before secure unlock mechanism
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Turn the screen off to see the selected notification in action or dismiss this dialog to stop the test
Enable Notification Light even when screen is on
Screen brightness levels for automatic mode
Button brightness levels for automatic mode
Buttons brightness will use the same value as the screen
Button brightness level for manual mode
All brightness levels will be reset to their default settings.
Pressing a volume button will wake your device
Pressing the headset button will launch voice controls
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rocker will seek music tracks

Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side

You have no button assigned to the \"Home\" action! This can make your device unusable!
Show clear all button within the recent applications view
Choose position of the clear all button
Sets the background of the notification panel header to an image based on the current date and time
Choose which volume gets changed by default

This RAM bar shows the actual android memory (RAM) utilization. Please note that having cached apps helps your device open apps much faster. For further explanations on how android memory (RAM) management works, check the help menu.
Reset RAM bar style to default?
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Enable/disable speak for Read New messages
Enable/disable speak for battery fully charged
Enable/disable speak for clock after screen turn on
Enable/disable speak for date after screen turn on
Enable/disable speak for Read New messages from notifications
Which apps allowed to speak for new notifications
Limit the speak notification of each app to only play once per set time period
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Hide low priority notifications such as those from Google Now.
Show active display notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display.
Brightness level for displaying notifications when automatic brightness is not enabled.
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
Invert the colors when in areas with bright light such as direct sunlight.
Turn off display if the device gets pocketed again and was turned on by Active Display.
This will hide all force close notifications
Enable visual pointer to show touches during screen recording
Use microphone as audio input during screen recording
Change hosts file to disable ads
Automatic light condition change mode is enabled. Manual switching is not possible.
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Make sure OmniSwitch is enabled prior to use
Double-tap and hold the slider to start torch
Restarting the System UI will significally change the values you modify.
Override the system color of the System UI

1 - To begin editing, tap the lock icon

2 - Tap any button to assign or change functionality

3 - Long press any button to rearrange the order

4 - To save, tap the lock icon again

5 - To restore system default, tap the reset button

• Actions can only be assigned to one button at a time

• The home button cannot be re-assigned

• Side buttons cannot be rearranged
Delete current settings and restore to default?
This will disable the safe volume warning when using headphones. A reboot is necessary in order to take effect.
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
When Privacy Guard is enabled, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for a built-in app, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Do not access personal data by default for newly-installed apps
Show notification if privacy guard is active.
Manage which apps have access to your personal data and other apps permissions
No apps with relevant permissions are installed

In this screen you can choose for which apps Privacy Guard should be active by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data, such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. Long pressing on an entry allows to set specifically app permissions.\n\nBy default built-in apps are not shown. If you want to show them or filter apps to show only the ones requesting access to personal data by their permissions, select the respective options in the menu.
Selected app does not request permissions which access personal data. Do you want to modify the other permissions?
Reset all permissions back to default?
This app has no changeable permissions.
Immediately reboot if an unknown computer is connected while device is locked
You don\'t have any blacklisted numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To blacklist calls and/or messages from certain numbers, enable the blacklist.
Incoming calls and messages from phone numbers in the blacklist will be blocked
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Do you want to remove this blacklist entry?
To configure and use System profiles, turn Profiles on.
Enter a name for the new profile
Add and configure a new profile
Delete all user created profiles and application groups and restore them to default?
An active profile cannot be deleted
Enter a name for the new application group
Disable lock screen security while this profile is active
Writing a profile to a NFC tag allows for tapping the tag to select the profile. Tapping a second time will select the previously selected profile.
This NFC tag refers to an unknown profile. Attaching this NFC tag to an existing profile will allow for selecting the profile in the future.
Lets you transfer any files between your computer and your SD card by mounting it as a flash device
Force hide the three-dot overflow menu in applications. Require restart of application
Force show the three-dot overflow menu in applications. Require restart of application
Multi DPI Gapps are generally recommended if changing system density to anything other then stock
Fully packed with the majority of GAPPS, these are commonly used by users that do not want to download/install them later
Just as the name implies, these GAPPS are blacked out / inverted to give you that beautiful dark look
While Xposed is proven to be a very useful tool, some modules may cause issues/bugs in custom ROMs. Please uninstall all modules before reporting any bugs that you may come across while using Xposed.
Browse and install modules to be used with Xposed Framework
Modified version of mGerrit to view DU as default gerrit
Google Camera (flashable) with photosphere and HDR mode
